effects.name: Ken Burns
effects.description: Slow pan and zoom across a still image. Classic documentary technique for bringing photos to life.

effects.name: Zoom Focus
effects.description: Start wide, zoom into a specific region of interest. For revealing details or directing attention.

effects.name: Photo Frame
effects.description: Image displayed in an animated photo frame with optional tilt and shadow.

effects.name: Document Reveal
effects.description: Paper or document unfolds/slides into view. Great for showing text sources.

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.label: Highlight Text
parameters.description: Text to highlight in the document

effects.name: Parallax Layers
effects.description: Multi-layer parallax movement creating 2.5D depth illusion. Foreground moves faster than background for a cinematic effect.

parameters.name: image
parameters.label: Image
parameters.description: The image to animate with parallax

effects.name: Fade Center
effects.description: Text fades in centered on screen. Simple, elegant presentation for quotes and key statements.

effects.name: Kinetic Typography
effects.description: Multiple phrases animate in sequence with scale and fade. Kinetic typography style for impactful statement breakdowns.

itemSchema.name: hold
itemSchema.label: Hold
itemSchema.description: Seconds to hold before next phrase

effects.name: Dramatic Reveal
effects.description: Text scales up from small with emphasis. High impact reveal for shocking statements or climactic moments.

effects.name: Bar Race
effects.description: Animated bar chart with bars growing in sequence. Racing bar effect for comparing multiple values.

parameters.name: max
parameters.label: Max Value
parameters.description: Maximum value for scale (auto if not set)

effects.name: Bar Chart with Callouts
effects.description: Bar chart with animated callout annotations pointing to specific bars. For highlighting data with explanatory notes.

effects.name: Line Chart
effects.description: Animated line chart with points connecting in sequence. For showing trends and time-series data.

parameters.name: show_points
parameters.label: Show Points
parameters.description: Show dots at each data point

effects.name: Pie Chart
effects.description: Animated pie chart with segments growing from center. Each segment appears with percentage label.

parameters.name: donut
parameters.label: Donut Style
parameters.description: Show as donut chart with hole in center

effects.name: Title Card
effects.description: Full-screen title card with fade in/out. Opening slide style for video introductions and section headers.

effects.name: Chapter Heading
effects.description: Chapter heading with number and title. For breaking content into numbered sections.

effects.name: Lower Third
effects.description: Lower third overlay with name and role. Speaker identification style for interviews and presentations.

effects.name: Counter Roll
effects.description: Number rolls up from 0 to target value. Classic counter animation for revealing statistics and counts.

effects.name: Bar Grow
effects.description: Horizontal bar grows from left to represent value. Good for showing progress or single-value comparisons.

parameters.name: show_value
parameters.label: Show Value
parameters.description: Display value at end of bar

effects.name: Highlight Pulse
effects.description: Number appears with pulsing highlight effect. Draws attention to key figures and important data points.

parameters.name: value
parameters.label: Value
parameters.description: The value to display (can include formatting)

effects.name: Map Flyover
effects.description: Pan and zoom across a map image, visiting multiple points of interest. For geographic storytelling and location narratives.

parameters.name: map
parameters.label: Map Image
parameters.description: The map image to animate over

parameters.name: points
parameters.label: Points
parameters.description: Points to visit on the map

itemSchema.name: label
itemSchema.label: Label
itemSchema.description: Label to show at this point

parameters.name: show_marker
parameters.label: Show Marker
parameters.description: Show animated marker that follows the path

parameters.name: show_trail
parameters.label: Show Trail
parameters.description: Show trail line behind the marker

parameters.name: marker_color
parameters.label: Marker Color
parameters.description: Color of the marker and trail

effects.name: Location Pin
effects.description: Animated pin drops onto a location with bounce effect and optional label.

effects.name: Text Highlight
effects.description: Text with animated marker highlight or underline effect. Great for emphasizing key phrases.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text
parameters.description: The text to display with highlight

effects.name: Typewriter
effects.description: Text appears letter by letter with a blinking cursor. Classic typewriter effect for quotes, code, or dramatic reveals.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.label: Duration
parameters.description: Total duration (text will finish typing and hold)

effects.name: Glitch Text
effects.description: Digital distortion effect with RGB split and scan lines. Perfect for tech, gaming, or cyberpunk aesthetics.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text
parameters.description: The text to display with glitch effect

parameters.name: intensity
parameters.label: Intensity
parameters.description: How intense the glitch effect is

effects.name: Bounce Text
effects.description: Text with bouncy, elastic physics animation. Each letter bounces in with spring dynamics.

effects.name: Text Scramble
effects.description: Text decodes/unscrambles character by character. Matrix/hacker style reveal.

effects.name: Gradient Text
effects.description: Animated gradient flowing through text. Eye-catching title effect.

effects.name: Text Pop
effects.description: Word-by-word reveal with scale and color emphasis. Lyric video style for impactful statements.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text
parameters.description: The text to animate (words will pop one by one)

parameters.name: emphasis_words
parameters.label: Emphasis Words
parameters.description: Comma-separated words to emphasize with color

effects.name: Source Citation
effects.description: Animated source/reference citation. Academic style attribution for credibility in documentaries and video essays.

effects.name: Circular Progress
effects.description: Animated circular progress ring filling up to a percentage. Great for showing completion, stats, or loading indicators.

effects.name: Progress Bar
effects.description: Horizontal progress bar filling from left to right. Classic progress indicator with percentage display.

parameters.name: label
parameters.label: Label
parameters.description: Text label for the progress bar

effects.name: Countdown Timer
effects.description: Animated countdown from a starting number with scale and fade effects. Perfect for intros, transitions, or building anticipation.

effects.name: Slide Transition
effects.description: Content slides in from an edge with customizable direction and easing. Great for scene transitions.

effects.name: Wipe Transition
effects.description: Screen wipe reveal effect with customizable direction and color. Classic broadcast transition.

effects.name: Dissolve Transition
effects.description: Smooth crossfade/dissolve between scenes. Classic film transition.

effects.name: Zoom Transition
effects.description: Camera pushes forward/backward through to next scene.

effects.name: Zoom Blur
effects.description: Speed zoom with radial motion blur. Creates dramatic zoom-through effect popular in action sequences and transitions.

effects.name: Glitch Transition
effects.description: Digital glitch distortion with RGB split, scan lines, and noise. Popular cyberpunk/tech aesthetic for video essays.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text
parameters.description: Text to display with glitch effect

effects.name: Horizontal Timeline
effects.description: Animated horizontal timeline with milestones appearing in sequence. Great for project roadmaps, history, or process flows.

effects.name: Callout Line
effects.description: Animated pointer line connecting to an element. Draws from origin to target with optional label.

effects.name: Callout Box
effects.description: Animated highlight box or circle that draws attention to a region.

effects.name: Split Screen
effects.description: Multi-panel split screen with animated reveals. Compare 2-4 items side by side.

parameters.name: panels
parameters.label: Panels
parameters.description: Array of panels with title, subtitle, color

effects.name: Before/After Wipe
effects.description: Slider-style wipe transition revealing before and after states. Classic comparison effect for transformations.

effects.name: Picture in Picture
effects.description: Floating video/image window overlay. Slides in from corner with shadow.

parameters.name: position
parameters.label: Position
parameters.description: Corner position of the PiP window

effects.name: VHS Retro
effects.description: VHS/CRT style overlay with scanlines, noise, and color distortion.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text Overlay
parameters.description: Optional text to display with VHS effect

effects.name: Film Grain
effects.description: Subtle film grain texture overlay for cinematic look.

effects.name: Light Leak
effects.description: Organic light leak and film burn overlay. Adds warmth, nostalgia, and texture to footage. Popular in documentary and video essay styles.

effects.name: Camera Shake
effects.description: Handheld camera shake effect. Adds tension, urgency, or documentary realism to footage.

parameters.name: text
parameters.label: Text
parameters.description: Optional text to display with shake

effects.name: Screen Frame
effects.description: Browser, phone, or laptop mockup frame. Perfect for showing websites, apps, tweets, or any screen content.

parameters.name: url
parameters.label: URL Bar
parameters.description: URL to show in browser address bar

parameters.name: content_text
parameters.label: Content Text
parameters.description: Text content to display inside frame

effects.name: Audio Waveform
effects.description: Animated audio waveform visualization. Great for podcast clips, music discussions, or audio-focused content.

effects.name: Data Ticker
effects.description: Scrolling news/data ticker like CNN or Bloomberg. Perfect for displaying multiple data points, headlines, or stats.

parameters.name: items
parameters.label: Ticker Items
parameters.description: Items to scroll across the ticker

effects.name: Social Media Post
effects.description: Twitter/X, Instagram, Reddit, or TikTok post mockup. Perfect for showing social media reactions, quotes, or discussions.

effects.name: Video Frame Stack
effects.description: Grid or stack of video thumbnails. Great for showing multiple references, related videos, or creating a "wall of content" effect.

parameters.name: count
parameters.label: Frame Count
parameters.description: Number of frames to show (if not using items)
